com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers

Class DurationArraySerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers.Serializer<T[]>
      • com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers.ArraySerializer<Long>
        • com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers.DurationArraySerializer

  • public class DurationArraySerializer
extends ArraySerializer<Long>
    An XML serializer for arrays of durations expressed as Longs in milliseconds.
